Class Volvo240

java.lang.Object
Volvo240
All Implemented Interfaces:
Car, Loadable, LoadableCar, Moveable
public class Volvo240 extends Object implements LoadableCar
Object class for constructing a Volvo240 with its specific features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Volvo240()
    Constructs a 100 horse-power, four-doors, black Volvo240 with start position in (0, 0).
